title: German Jhin VO ( red response would be kind)
body: Jhins german VO is lacking the Chorus in the Background. There IS a Background Sound, yet it is a monotone melody, whereas his english (and all other) VO´s have the Chorus in the Background, which kinda screws his german VO ALOT, at least for me. So an answer of a red would be nice, if this is intended OR  a bug and when it could be fixed, if it would be fixable at all.

replies.body:
Hey Jhindamere! 

Thanks for bringing this up. Let me follow up with our localization team and see what the case may be here. :)

**EDIT**: We unfortunately couldn't get the German studio to record a better chorus in time for his release but will have it out soon(ish)!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FbOVlWQ5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-23T17:25:18.828+0000)
>
> Hey Jhindamere! 
> 
> Thanks for bringing this up. Let me follow up with our localization team and see what the case may be here. :)
> 
> **EDIT**: We unfortunately couldn't get the German studio to record a better chorus in time for his release but will have it out soon(ish)!

Ahh I see. Soonish like, end of 2k16 or early/mid 2k17?? also wouldnt it be possible to just replay the raw german quotes with the english versionÂ´s Chorus in the Background?? Like, "Kunst ist die Schmerzen wert" ( german Version for "Art is worth the pain" and play the Chorus of that english Versions Chorus for it?
